overview: Lance Uggla co-founded Markit in 2001. He has comprehensive experience in the development and management of global debt capital markets teams. Prior to Markit, Lance was Vice Chair of TD Securities and head of its Europe and Asia divisions, responsible for building all offshore debt capital markets activities. His responsibilities included investment grade credit trading portfolios with a value in excess of USD 15 billion. Lance joined TD Securities in 1995 from CIBC World Markets where he worked for nine years, most recently as Head of Global Fixed Income.
